name: @leylines/leylines-geodesy
description: geodesy module for calculating global leylines
author: Joerg Roth

scripts.publish-doc: bash -c "rm -rf ../leylines-docs/@leylines/leylines-geodesy && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc -c jsdoc.json  && cd ../leylines-docs && git add . && git commit -m 'Generate Documentation' && git push -f origin HEAD:gh-pages"
